top_comments.comment: Ohh expensive ,I thought it was cheap (I live in India)

Just try this "ginger-cardamom coffee" recipe and tell me how it was...
Take a cup of milk, add 1tsp sugar, add 1tsp instant coffee powder, grate a nail sized ginger, pound 1-2 green cardamoms and then boil.
Your coffee is ready.
Cardamom are in high demand because of Diwali festival and damn they are costly

comments_since_last_sample.body: I never heard of this spice.
It ain't even expensive here in India, may be you guys are from Vasco-de-Gama's poor country.

Just try this "ginger-cardamom coffee" recipe and tell me how it was...
Take a cup of milk, add 1tsp sugar, add 1tsp instant coffee powder, grate a nail sized ginger, pound 1-2 green cardamoms and then boil.
Your coffee is ready.
Its super cheap in my country
I have tea with this stuff,it adds an exotic aroma to it that adds a boost to my mornings.
Lol i was just sipping cardamom tea while watching this
Due to these ppl hard work, my wife makes the best cardamom Tea.
OoO, never knew it grew in india, idk why i forget that British colonized India for spices only

people who planted it,take good care of it,harvest it, and prepared it, - got less than 10% 

people who sold it got 65-80% 

the government who let it happen got 10-15%
Everything is so expensive because of Joe biden.....
Cardamom are in high demand because of Diwali festival and damn they are costly
